short_summary: purchase of furniture under the SA for categories 1, 2 and 5
description: purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Notice Title
EF937-241625 - Purchase of Furniture for EDSC

## Brief Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites proposals from qualified suppliers for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture for the Department of Employment and Social Development (EDSC) in Trois-Rivières, Quebec.

## Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Number: WS4417558085
* Publication Date: February 2, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 22, 2024, at 14:00:00 EST
* Amendment Number: 4
* Date of Amendment: February 19, 2024
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and others (listed below)

## Scope of Work
The successful supplier will provide all necessary office furniture, including [refer to UNSPSC codes: *56110000 Commercial and industrial furniture* and *56112200 Desking systems*] for installation in Trois-Rivières, Quebec.

## Special Instructions
All interested suppliers are required to review the solicitation document for complete details and requirements.

## Contact Information
Corine Lavoie (SPAC/PSPC)
Corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Related Agreements
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

## Location
Trois-Rivières, Quebec

## Solicitation Document
Available at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18692411?extsite=MTg2OTI0MTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Important Dates
* Tender Closing Date: February 22, 2024, at 14:00:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
